narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Cooks Healthcare, LLC is a Non-emergency Medical Transport (VAN) provider based in New Albany, MS. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $24.9M in Medicaid payments across 317K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $24.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
